title: Great Basin National Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 5 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Great Basin National Park The Winchester Heard 'Round the World      Time: 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM Location: Great Basin National Park Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 03/30/2016 to 12/31/2016 A temporary display of the Winchester Model 1873 found in the park. View Details      Great Basin National Park Astronomy Programs      Time: 8:00 PM Location: Lehman Caves Visitors Center Fees: Free     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 All Astronomy programs will start with a ranger talk at the Lehman Caves Visitors Center followed by ranger led telescope viewing. No telescope is required as we have them available. View Details      Great Basin National Park For All of Time and Space      Location: Great Basin National Park Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Join us for a time capsule burial and "First Light" for the Great Basin Observatory. View Details      Great Basin National Park Star Train with the Nevada Northern Railway      Location: Ely, NV Fees: Tickets required     Friday, September 2, 2016 Great Basin National Park and the Nevada Northern Railway in Ely, NV are once again excited to offer the NNRW's Star Train. No telescope is required as we will have them available.  View Details
